module.string:
[magenta]WE RIDE AT DAWN[magenta]
A Twitch-integrated multiplayer text pilgrimage.
Built in Unity by [white]Tom Farro[white].
Type [yellow]HELP[yellow] for a list of commands.
Revision 00 / Serial number 000000.

[magenta]CREDITS[magenta]:
Built in [cyan]Unity 5.3.2f1[cyan] by [white]Tom Farro[white]
Connect with him on Twitter at [white]@FomTarro[white].
Visit his website at [magenta]http://tomfarro.com[magenta].
Using framework code from [cyan]Twtich Plays 1.0[cyan] by [white]Alvios Games[white].
